description:
In this course focused on sculpting and using dDo, instructor Galen Davis takes us through the complete pipeline of creating a Fantasy Shield. Davis demonstrates the ZBrush sculpting process, how to render out all the necessary texture maps, and then introduces you to dDo as we cover the complete texturing process with this powerful new software. dDo introduces a whole new tool for your game assets you won't want to miss!

About the Instructor:

Galen Davis is an Environment Artist currently living and working in Southern California. He is contributing to several AAA titles and is experienced in Next Generation Pipelines. Games and art are his absolute passion.
title: Creating and Texturing a Fantasy Shield with dDo
